body:
When installing Boost@1.54.0 with python3, spack cannot patch boost.build and throws an error:
```
Staging archive: *****/boost_1_54_0.tar.bz2
The text leading up to this was:
--------------------------
|diff --git a/tools/build/src/tools/python.jam b/tools/build/src/tools/python.jam
|index 90377ea..123f66a 100644
|--- a/tools/build/src/tools/python.jam
|+++ b/tools/build/src/tools/python.jam
--------------------------
```
This is due to a change in the directory structure of boost.build. For versions before 1.56.0 the path should be `/tools/build/v2/tools/python.jam`
title: Boost fails for versions < 1.56.0 with python3
